document_data.mainbody:
latian was the apprentice of a reclusive lich and arcane researcher Estera, sometime before 1372 DR.
During his apprenticeship, Alatian scoured countless graveyards on behest of his undead master. Wearing Alatians Spell Shroud, folk who witnessed him in the daed of night often mistook the apprentice for a ghost, thanks to the Shrouds eery blue glow. Eventually, Alatian was rewarded for his tireless work with eternal life as a lich.
